channel.title: RareCrafting
channel.description:
ok now i have further elaborated on a new skill called rare crafting. so far i have santa hats, phats, disk of returning, rubber chicken, scythe, and bunny ears. now this will be a regular skill. u need materials and know how to make it to advance levels. now currently i have absolutely no idea how to code java (the behaviors really screwed me up) but can anyone possibly code what im talking about? heres my plans:
RareCrafting- Santa Hat- Materials-2x Pieces of Wool 1x Ball of Wool 1x Needle and Thread 1x Red Dye 1. Use red dye with one of the pieces of wool. 2. Use needle with 2 pieces oif wool (red and white) to get Santa Hat(u) 3. Use Ball of Wool with Santa Hat(u) to get santa hat.
Party Hats- Materials-1x Color Dye For Color YOu Want 1x Knife 1x Soft Clay 1. Mold Soft clay to Party Hat (t) (template) using knife. 2. Use in Firing oven to make Hard Party Hat (t) 3. Use color you want party hat to be with Hard Party Hat(t)
Disk of Returning- Materials-1x Sapphire 1x DragonStone 1x Chisel 1. Use Sapphire and DragonStone with a furnace to get Crystal Disk. 2. Use Chisel with Crystal Disk to Get Uncharged Disk. 3. Cast Either Lvl 1 or Lvl 5 Enchant Jewelery to get Disk of Returning.
Rubber Chicken-(this one i wasnt sure how to make) Materials-1x Raw Chicken 1x Bowl of Water 1. Use Raw Chicken with Bowl of Water 2. Use Chicken Bowl with range to get rubber chicken.
Scythe-(This one still not sure on) Materials-1x Iron/Steel Scimitar 1x Staff 1. Use Iron/Steel Scimitar with furnace to get scimitar blade. 2. Hammer Scimitar Blade with staff to get Scythe.
Bunny Ears- Materials-2x Red Dye's 3x Pieces of Wool 1x Needle and Thread 1. Use Both Dye's with 2 Pieces of Wool. 2. Use Needle with Piece of Wool (Doesnt matter which one)
so can someone figure out a way to code this? if you could i would be so grateful.
please post even if u think its a good idea.

item.title: RareCrafting
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok now i have further elaborated on a new skill called rare crafting. so far i have santa hats, phats, disk of returning, rubber chicken, scythe, and bunny ears. now this will be a regular skill. u need materials and know how to make it to advance levels. now currently i have absolutely no idea how to code java (the behaviors really screwed me up) but can anyone possibly code what im talking about? heres my plans:

RareCrafting-
Santa Hat-
Materials-2x Pieces of Wool
1x Ball of Wool
1x Needle and Thread
1x Red Dye

  1. Use red dye with one of the pieces of wool.

  2. Use needle with 2 pieces oif wool (red and white) to get Santa Hat(u)

  3. Use Ball of Wool with Santa Hat(u) to get santa hat.

    Party Hats-
    Materials-1x Color Dye For Color YOu Want
    1x Knife
    1x Soft Clay

  4. Mold Soft clay to Party Hat (t) (template) using knife.

  5. Use in Firing oven to make Hard Party Hat (t)

  6. Use color you want party hat to be with Hard Party Hat(t)

    Disk of Returning-
    Materials-1x Sapphire
    1x DragonStone
    1x Chisel

  7. Use Sapphire and DragonStone with a furnace to get Crystal Disk.

  8. Use Chisel with Crystal Disk to Get Uncharged Disk.

  9. Cast Either Lvl 1 or Lvl 5 Enchant Jewelery to get Disk of Returning.

    Rubber Chicken-(this one i wasnt sure how to make)
    Materials-1x Raw Chicken
    1x Bowl of Water

  10. Use Raw Chicken with Bowl of Water

  11. Use Chicken Bowl with range to get rubber chicken.

    Scythe-(This one still not sure on)
    Materials-1x Iron/Steel Scimitar
    1x Staff

  12. Use Iron/Steel Scimitar with furnace to get scimitar blade.

  13. Hammer Scimitar Blade with staff to get Scythe.

    Bunny Ears-
    Materials-2x Red Dye’s
    3x Pieces of Wool
    1x Needle and Thread

  14. Use Both Dye’s with 2 Pieces of Wool.

  15. Use Needle with Piece of Wool (Doesnt matter which one)

so can someone figure out a way to code this? if you could i would be so grateful.

please post even if u think its a good idea.
